title: Oil prices plunge after OPEC+ talks break down - Aljazeera.com
description: Oil prices plunge after OPEC+ talks break down Aljazeera.com Trump threatens imposing tariffs on 'oil coming from outside' CBC.ca Saudi Arabia, Russia push negotiations for global oil pact BNNBloomberg.ca Op-Ed: The US oil industry is more likely to be saved …
content:
Oil prices skidded on Monday after negotiations between Saudi Arabia and Russia to cut output were delayed, keeping oversupply concerns alive, while stocks jumped as investors were encouraged by a slowdown in coronavirus-related deaths and new cases.
